content.query:
;WITH jsonSchema AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT jsonDoc.[key], jsonDoc.Type
    FROM stage1.marvel_hero_raw mhr
        CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(doc) jsonDoc
    WHERE jsonDoc.Type <> 0
), columns AS (
    SELECT *,
        CASE js.[Type]
            WHEN 1 THEN QUOTENAME(js.[key]) + ' VARCHAR(4000)'
            WHEN 2 THEN QUOTENAME(js.[key]) + ' FLOAT'
            WHEN 3 THEN QUOTENAME(js.[key]) + ' VARCHAR(5)'
            ELSE QUOTENAME(js.[key]) + ' NVARCHAR(MAX) ''$.' + js.[key] + ''' AS JSON'
        END AS colSQL
    FROM jsonSchema js 
)

SELECT STRING_AGG(colSQL,',' + CHAR(13) + CHAR(10)) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY [Type], [key]) AS colSQL
FROM columns
